game.name: Operation: Tango
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 협동하는 스파이 모험에서 세계를 구하려면 두 명이 필요합니다. 요원이나 해커로 친구와 짝을 이루어 자신의 음성만을 연결하고 함께 협력하여, 첨단 기술을 지닌 세계적으로 위협적인 존재를 물리치세요.지금 무료 콘텐츠 업데이트!
game.shortDescriptionEn: It takes two to save the world in this cooperative spy adventure. Pair up with a friend as Agent or Hacker—with only your voices to connect you—and work together to bring a hi-tech global menace to its knees. Now with a FREE CONTENT UPDATE!

reviewHighlights.text: Wonderful game and really tests your cooperation skills. BEWARE: this game has some bugs that keep you from progressing, requiring reloading the save.
I wasn't sure what to expect since we have not played a game like this before, but I'm so glad we got it. It's a great game as long as your both patie...
